Title: APC chairman links poverty to insurgency, kidnapping, insecurity
Summary: Prof. Nentawe Yilwatda has identified poverty as a major driver of insurgency, kidnapping, and insecurity in Nigeria . He made the remark in a keynote address at the 20th Anniversary Convention of the All Progressives Congress .

Title: Amaechi says real electoral reform won’t happen under Tinubu govt
Summary: Rotimi Amaechi made the remarks while speaking at the 2027 National Political Dialogue on Electoral Reforms webinar held . He said real changes to Nigeria's election system will not happen under President Bola Tinubu's government .

Title: Lagos accuses Peter Obi of misleading public over trade fair demolition
Summary: Lagos State Government has reaffirmed that the demolition of structures at the Trade Fair Complex was conducted in accordance with physical planning laws . Lagos accuses Peter Obi of misleading public over trade fair demolition .

Title: Nigeria through the generations: 65 Years of Growth
Summary: The country has continued to evolve, innovate and shine . From music to sports, film to fashion, and even fashion, the country has evolved . The country is celebrating 65 years of independence .

Title: IYC urges INEC to obey court order on voter registration in wards, units
Summary: Ijaw Youth Council urges INEC to comply with Supreme Court judgment that nullified existing wards and units in Warri Federal Constituency . IYC warns that any voter registration exercise conducted under the voided order will be voided .

Title: Makinde commiserates with Arise TV over Maduagwu’s death
Summary: Makinde urged her colleagues and relations to take heart, praying that God would grant them the fortitude to bear the loss . She urged them to take a bit of comfort and pray for their loved ones .

Title: FIFA U-20WC: Nigeria vs Saudi Arabia – date, time and where to watch
Summary: Nigeria play Saudi Arabia in their second group game of the 2025 FIFA U-20 World Cup on Friday, October 3 . The Flying Eagles will be desperate to bounce back when they face Saudi Arabia .

Title: US Senate rejects plan to end government shutdown
Summary: US Senate rejects plan to end government shutdown . Essential workers such as the military and border agents may be forced to work without pay . Some will likely miss paychecks next week .

Title: Supreme Court blocks Trump from immediately firing Fed Gov. cook
Summary: US Supreme Court bars Donald Trump from immediately firing Federal Reserve Governor Lisa Cook . The president mounts multiple challenges that have tested the independence of the central bank .

Title: ADC raises alarm over proposed sale of oil assets
Summary: ADC raises alarm over proposed sale of oil assets . Abdullahi said the 65th independence anniversary came at a time of hardship for millions of Nigerians .
